NPC.name: octogirl
NPC.description: From the waist up she's a buxom and curvacous tanned woman with a mane of untamed seaweed green hair. Below the waist eight sucker lined tentacles extend and stretch out, curling and writhing to paddling to push her through the water. In the midst of those tentacles can be caught a glimpse of, instead of a beak, a broad feminine slit. For attitude she has a carefree, but hungry and lusty interest in any prey who have no business in the depths of the ocean with her.
